org.apache.accumulo.server.security.handler

Class KerberosPermissionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.server.security.handler.KerberosPermissionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermissionHandler

    public class KerberosPermissionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PermissionHandler
    Kerberos principals might contains identifiers that are not valid ZNodes ('/'). Base64-encodes the principals before interacting with ZooKeeper.
